name: @smoketech/shared-config
description: Shared configuration and presets for SmokeTech video generation system (viral engine + omega-platform)

scripts.copy-config: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.join('src', 'config'); const dest = path.join('dist', 'config'); if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(src).filter(f => f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src, f), path.join(dest, f)));"

author: SmokeDev
